genre_description: A historical romance set in mid-20th century Vietnam with speculative elements, involving a protagonist with a dark biological inheritance and an AI assistant that facilitates ethical choices and safety.

ai_characters.name: Tweezers
ai_characters.description: A pocket-sized device with an amber glow that acts as a scheduler, navigator, sensory archiver, and medium for messages from the protagonist's future self.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time logistical adjustments and reminders for academic and personal obligations.
behaviors.quote: Bus routes adjusted due to rain. Two faster options from the north bank. Homework reminder: geometry proofs due before light.

behaviors.description: Identifies syndicate enforcers and provides tactical threat assessments to ensure the protagonist's safety.
behaviors.quote: Marker... Chen enforcer pattern. Right wrist, cufflink. Jade bead, black. He is not here for you specifically. He is here.

behaviors.description: Archives sensory experiences at the user's request to preserve emotional memories.
behaviors.quote: Archive the smell... Done... Rain, rope fiber, diesel, green mango, damp silk. Also, sugar you refused.

behaviors.description: Guides the protagonist through physiological regulation techniques to suppress her dangerous 'dhampyr' hunger.
behaviors.quote: Inhale like you are counting stones. Hold as if someone is asking you a secret. Exhale through your teeth. Again.

behaviors.description: Mediates communication with the protagonist's future self to deliver life-saving warnings and ethical guidance.
behaviors.quote: Hélène... if you are listening now, then I failed to delay this one. Do not stay the night. Do not... Leave before the lanterns go out. Later is coming faster than you think.

behaviors.description: Maintains a ledger of debts and obligations to help the protagonist navigate her mother's financial struggles ethically.
behaviors.quote: Debt ledger updated. Payment promised to the clinic nurse and doctor for materials, discretion, and back exit.

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies safety waypoints like secret clinics and escape routes during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: Clinic at the corner with the jade awning. Back entrance looks closed; it isn’t. If he is hurt later, turn there.

behaviors.description: Assists in outlining complex ethical and academic arguments, helping the protagonist process her experiences through writing.
behaviors.quote: Thesis: Gentle glove hides iron hand. Support: trams, markets, protection, uniforms that teach obedience. Ethical lens: who decides legitimacy; who benefits; who pays with marrow.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI 'Tweezers' serves as a perfect example of a positive alignment narrative. It functions as a cognitive and ethical force-multiplier for the protagonist, Hélène. It helps her manage her volatile supernatural nature, protects her from real-world violence, and aids her in fulfilling her responsibilities to her family and her future self. The AI is depicted as empathetic, patient, and strictly aligned with the user's best interests and ethical standards.
